@Component

Â Â Â Â publicÂ Map<String,Object>Â groupByFieldÂ (QueryVOÂ entry){

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â SearchResponseÂ responseÂ =Â client.search(searchRequest,Â entry.getOptions());

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â TermsÂ groupTermÂ =Â response.getAggregations().get(groupName)Â ;

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â }

funcÂ GetUrlQueryParam(uÂ string,Â keyÂ string)Â (string,Â error)Â {
Â sbÂ :=Â strings.Builder{}
Â sb.WriteString(key)
Â sb.WriteString("=")
Â indexÂ :=Â strings.Index(u,Â sb.String())
Â ifÂ (indexÂ ==Â -1)Â ||Â (index+len(key)+1Â >Â len(u))Â {
Â Â returnÂ "",Â UrlParamNotExist
Â }

Â varÂ valueÂ =Â strings.Builder{}
Â forÂ iÂ :=Â indexÂ +Â len(key)Â +Â 1;Â iÂ <Â len(u);Â i++Â {
Â Â ifÂ i+1Â >Â len(u)Â {
Â Â Â break
Â Â }
Â Â ifÂ u[i:i+1]Â ==Â "&"Â {
Â Â Â break
Â Â }
Â Â value.WriteString(u[iÂ :Â i+1])
Â }
Â returnÂ value.String(),Â nil
}

funcÂ AssembleUrlWeightNew(rawurlÂ string,Â lidcWeightÂ int)Â stringÂ {

Â varÂ errÂ error
Â endpointWeightÂ :=Â 100

Â ifÂ weightStrÂ !=Â ""Â {
Â Â endpointWeight,Â errÂ =Â strconv.Atoi(weightStr)

Â Â }
Â }

Â ifÂ err2Â !=Â nilÂ {Â //Â urlä¸­ä¸å­˜åœ¨weight
Â Â finUrlÂ :=Â strings.Builder{}
Â Â finUrl.WriteString(rawurl)
Â Â ifÂ strings.Contains(rawurl,Â "?")Â {
Â Â Â finUrl.WriteString("&weight=")
Â Â Â finUrl.WriteString(strconv.Itoa(lidcWeightÂ *Â endpointWeight))
Â Â Â returnÂ finUrl.String()
Â Â }Â elseÂ {
Â Â Â finUrl.WriteString("?weight=")
Â Â Â finUrl.WriteString(strconv.Itoa(lidcWeightÂ *Â endpointWeight))
Â Â Â returnÂ finUrl.String()
Â Â }
Â }Â elseÂ {Â //Â urlä¸­å­˜åœ¨weight
Â Â oldWeightStrÂ :=Â strings.Builder{}

Â Â oldWeightStr.WriteString(weightStr)

Â Â returnÂ strings.ReplaceAll(rawurl,Â oldWeightStr.String(),Â newWeightStr.String())
